name: VillDays [English/Spanish] (CANCELED)
description:
An apolalypse occured, and now you are the leader of a Village. And you and your villagers will be rescued in a few days! But... Your provisions won't last long. Don't worry, some villagers can help you get food or medicine... But OTHERS are only GLUTTONS that damage the sanity of your Village! So you can sacrifice them each night to survive. It's your decision...

Go and talk to villagers to know them more! Each day they'll do different things! So be attentive to what they do!
